biotools.summary: PHIEmbed is a phage-host interaction prediction tool that uses protein language models to represent the receptor-binding proteins of phages. It presents improvements over using handcrafted (manually feature-engineered) sequence properties and eliminates the need to manually extract and select features from phage sequences.
